data.prayer: Spirit, guide someone in the church in the state of Kurunegala to a person ready to receive the message of the gospel, like Lydia, and who will then open her home to faith.
data.verse: One of those listening was a woman from the city of Thyatira named Lydia, a dealer in purple cloth. She was a worshiper of God. The Lord opened her heart to respond to Paul’s message.

data.location_label: Photo from the state of Kurunegala, Sri Lanka
data.section_summary: What beauty can God be thanked for in this photo?

data.prayer: Spirit, how will they hear without a preacher? How will they preach unless they have a Bible? Please give the people in the state of Kurunegala access to a Bible in their own language.
data.verse: How, then, can they call on the one they have not believed in? And how can they believe in the one of whom they have not heard? And how can they hear without someone preaching to them? And how can anyone preach unless they are sent? As it is written: “How beautiful are the feet of those who bring good news!”

data.prayer: Spirit, encourage the church of Kurunegala, Sri Lanka that they are blessed with every heavenly blessing.
data.verse: Blessed be the God and Father of our Lord Jesus Christ, who has blessed us with every spiritual blessing in the heavenly places in Christ

data.prayer: Father, please give the church in the state of Kurunegala prophets who can build up holiness and faithfulness to you.
data.verse: So Christ himself gave the apostles, the prophets, the evangelists, the pastors and teachers, to equip his people for works of service, so that the body of Christ may be built up

data.prayer: Lord, Let your Kingdom come among the Yadav (Hindu traditions) people. Let your will be done, as in heaven, so on earth.
Father, we cry out for a prayer movement in the state of Kurunegala, Sri Lanka. Please, stir the 201 believers here to pray for awakening.
Lord, please make the same Spirit that raised Jesus from the dead give life to those who are called by his name in the state of Kurunegala.
data.verse: But if the Spirit of him who raised up Jesus from the dead dwells in you, he who raised up Christ Jesus from the dead will also give life to your mortal bodies through his Spirit who dwells in you.

data.prayer: Father, grace the churches in Kurunegala, Sri Lanka with faithful local leaders.
data.verse: Where there is no guidance, a people falls, but in an abundance of counselors there is safety.

location.name: Kurunegala
location.people_groups_list: Bania, Shaikh, Yamannu, Paraiyan (Hindu traditions), Sonar (Hindu traditions)
location.people_groups_list_w_pop: Bania (16,000), Shaikh (200,000), Yamannu (77,000), Paraiyan (Hindu traditions) (102,000), Sonar (Hindu traditions) (6,200)
